name: Upload a new user into LinkedIn Matched Audiences from a new row in a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet
description:
This template regularly checks for new rows in a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet and uses the retrieved information to upload new users into LinkedIn Matched Audiences.

Your worksheet needs to have these columns:
1) First Name	
2) Last Name	
3) Email	
4) Job Title	
5) Company	
6) Country

For the best performance, you should fill out as many columns as possible but as the bare minimum, your worksheet should always provide these fields:
1) First name
2) Last name
3) Email

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template by clicking the clock icon on the first module.
